info.description: This is the API service server for the Web Application built by the Circuit Squad.
info.title: Circuit Squad API service server for the web-based medical application

post.summary: Creates a new ministry of health account
post.description: Takes ministry's details in json format and creates a ministry of health instance in the database

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Ministry Of health object that needs to be added to the database

post.summary: Allows ministry of health to consume protected API endpoints by autheticating them and providing them an authentication and authorization token

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Patient's login credentials

400.description: Invalid operation: Incorrect login credentials or unregistered email address.

put.summary: Updates a specific ministry Of health accounts details. This endpoint is protected hence request will not be served unless authorized.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Numeric ID of the ministry of health account account to update

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Ministry of health's fields details to update

delete.summary: Deletes a specific doctor account. The account is specified by the id. This endpoint is protected hence request will not be served unless authorized.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Numeric ID of the ministry of health account to delete

post.description: Takes hospital details in json format and creates a ministry of health instance in the database

parameters.name: ministryOfHealthId
parameters.description: Numeric ID of the ministry of health governing the hospital

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Ministry Of health object that needs to be added to the database

post.summary: Allows hospital to consume protected API endpoints by autheticating them and providing them an authentication and authorization token

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Patient's login credentials

400.description: Invalid operation: Incorrect login credentials or unregistered email address.

get.summary: Retrieves a specific hospital accounts details. This endpoint is protected hence request will not be served unless authorized.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Numeric ID of the hosptial account to get

put.summary: Updates a specific hospital accounts details. This endpoint is protected hence request will not be served unless authorized.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Numeric ID of the hospital account to update

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Hospital's fields details to update

delete.summary: Deletes a specific hospital account. The account is specified by the id. This endpoint is protected hence request will not be served unless authorized.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Numeric ID of the hospital account to delete

post.summary: Creates a new insurance company account
post.description: Takes insurance company's details in json format and creates a insurance company instance in the database

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Ministry Of health object that needs to be added to the database

post.summary: Allows insurance company to consume protected API endpoints by autheticating them and providing them an authentication and authorization token

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Insurance company's login credentials

400.description: Invalid operation: Incorrect login credentials or unregistered email address.

get.summary: Retrieves a specific insurance company accounts details. This endpoint is protected hence request will not be served unless authorized.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Numeric ID of the hosptial account to get

put.summary: Updates a specific insurance company accounts details. This endpoint is protected hence request will not be served unless authorized.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Numeric ID of the insurance company account account to update

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Insurance company's fields details to update

delete.summary: Deletes a specific insurance company account. The account is specified by the id. This endpoint is protected hence request will not be served unless authorized.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Numeric ID of the insurance company account to delete

post.description: Takes doctor's details in json format and creates a doctor instance in the database

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Doctor object that needs to be added to the database

post.summary: Allows doctor to consume protected API endpoints by autheticating them and providing them an authentication and authorization token

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Doctor's login credentials

400.description: Invalid operation: Incorrect login credentials or unregistered email address.

get.summary: Retrieves all doctor accounts details. This endpoint is protected hence request will not be served unless authorized.
Retrieves a specific doctor accounts details. This endpoint is protected hence request will not be served unless authorized.

parameters.name: doctorId
parameters.description: Numeric ID of the doctor account to get

put.summary: Updates a specific doctor accounts details. This endpoint is protected hence request will not be served unless authorized.

parameters.name: doctorId
parameters.description: Numeric ID of the doctor account to update

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Doctor's fields details to update

delete.summary: Deletes a specific doctor account. The account is specified by the id. This endpoint is protected hence request will not be served unless authorized.

parameters.name: doctorId
parameters.description: Numeric ID of the doctor account to delete

post.description: Takes patient's details in json format and creates a doctor instance in the database

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Patient object that needs to be created to the database

post.summary: Allows patient to consume protected API endpoints by autheticating them and providing them an authentication and authorization token

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Patient's login credentials

400.description: Invalid operation: Incorrect login credentials or unregistered email address.

get.summary: Retrieves all patient accounts details. This endpoint is protected hence request will not be served unless authorized.
Retrieves a patient accounts details. The account to be fetched is specified by the id

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Numeric ID of the patient to get

put.summary: Updates a specific patient accounts details. This endpoint is protected hence request will not be served unless authorized.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Numeric ID of the patient account to update

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Patient's fields details to update

delete.summary: Deletes a specific patient account. The account is specified by the id. This endpoint is protected hence request will not be served unless authorized.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Numeric ID of the patient account to delete

get.summary: Retrieves all payment details. This endpoint is protected hence request will not be served unless authorized.
Retrieves a single payment details. The payment is specified by the id. This endpoint is protected hence request will not be served unless authorized.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Numeric ID of the payment to get

put.summary: Updates a payment details specified by the id. This endpoint is protected hence request will not be served unless authorized.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Numeric ID of the payment to update

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Payment's fields details to update

delete.summary: Deletes a specific payement with the specified by the id. The account is specified by the id. This endpoint is protected hence request will not be served unless authorized.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Numeric ID of the payment to delete

post.summary: Creates a new payment resource in the database. The payment is specified by the id. This endpoint is protected hence request will not be served unless authorized.

parameters.name: serviceId
parameters.description: Numeric ID of the service the payment belongs to

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Patient's login credentials

get.summary: Retrieves a service details. The service to be fetched is specified by the id. This endpoint is protected hence request will not be served unless authorized.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Numeric ID of the service to get

put.summary: Updates a specific service details. This endpoint is protected hence request will not be served unless authorized.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Numeric ID of the service to update

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Service's fields details to update

delete.summary: Deletes a specific service. The service is specified by the id. This endpoint is protected hence request will not be served unless authorized.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Numeric ID of the service account to delete

get.summary: Retrieves all serivice details. This endpoint is protected hence request will not be served unless authorized.

post.summary: Creates a new service resource in the database. The service is specified by the id. This endpoint is protected hence request will not be served unless authorized.

parameters.name: appointmentId
parameters.description: Numeric ID of the appointment the service belongs to

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Patient's login credentials

get.summary: Retrieves an appointment details. The appointment to be fetched is specified by the id. This endpoint is protected hence request will not be served unless authorized.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Numeric ID of the appointment to get

put.summary: Updates a specific appointment details. This endpoint is protected hence request will not be served unless authorized.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Numeric ID of the appointment to update

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Appointment's fields details to update

delete.summary: Deletes a specific appointment. The appointment is specified by the id. This endpoint is protected hence request will not be served unless authorized.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Numeric ID of the appointment to delete

get.summary: Retrieves all appointment details. This endpoint is protected hence request will not be served unless authorized.

post.summary: Creates a new appointment resource in the database. The service is specified by the id. This endpoint is protected hence request will not be served unless authorized.

parameters.name: patientId
parameters.description: Numeric ID of the patient the appointment belongs to

parameters.name: doctorId
parameters.description: Numeric ID of the doctor the appointment belongs to

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Appointment details

get.summary: Retrieves a diagnosis details. The diagnosis to be fetched is specified by the id. This endpoint is protected hence request will not be served unless authorized.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Numeric ID of the diagnosis to get

put.summary: Updates a specific diagnosis details. This endpoint is protected hence request will not be served unless authorized.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Numeric ID of the diagnosis to update

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Diagnaosis' fields details to update

delete.summary: Deletes a specific diagnisis. The diagnisis is specified by the id. This endpoint is protected hence request will not be served unless authorized.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Numeric ID of the diagnisis to delete

get.summary: Retrieves all diagnosis details. This endpoint is protected hence request will not be served unless authorized.

post.summary: Creates a new diagnosis resource in the database. The service is specified by the id. This endpoint is protected hence request will not be served unless authorized.

parameters.name: appointmentId
parameters.description: Numeric ID of the appointment the diagnosis belongs to

parameters.name: patientId
parameters.description: Numeric ID of the patient the diagnosis belongs to

parameters.name: doctorId
parameters.description: Numeric ID of the doctor the diagnosis who made the diagnosis

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Diagnosis details

get.summary: Retrieves all medications details. This endpoint is protected hence request will not be served unless authorized.
Retrieves a medication's details. The medication to be fetched is specified by the id. This endpoint is protected hence request will not be served unless authorized.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Numeric ID of the medication to get

put.summary: Updates a specific medication details. This endpoint is protected hence request will not be served unless authorized.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Numeric ID of the medication to update

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Medication's fields details to update

delete.summary: Deletes a specific medication. The medication is specified by the id. This endpoint is protected hence request will not be served unless authorized.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Numeric ID of the medication to delete

post.summary: Creates a new medication resource in the database. This endpoint is protected hence request will not be served unless authorized.

parameters.name: diagnosisId
parameters.description: Numeric ID of the diagnosis the medication belongs to

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Medication details

id.description: This is an auto-generated ministry of health's identification number

name.description: This is the ministry of health's name

email.description: This is the ministry of health's email address

password.description: This is the ministry of health's passkey that would be used during authentication process

phoneNumber.description: This is the ministry of health's phone number

address.description: This is the doctor's residential address

id.description: This is an auto-generated Insurance company's identification number

name.description: This is the ministry of Insurance company's name

email.description: This is the Insurance company's email address

password.description: This is the ministry of Insurance company's passkey that would be used during authentication process

phoneNumber.description: This is the ministry of Insurance company's phone number

address.description: This is the Insurance company's residential address

id.description: This is an auto-generated hospital's identification number

name.description: This is the hospital's first name

email.description: This is the hospital's email address

password.description: This is the hospital's passkey that would be used during authentication process

phoneNumber.description: This is the hospital's phone number

address.description: This is the hospital's residential address

id.description: This is an auto-generated doctor's identification number

firstName.description: This is the doctor's first name

lastName.description: This is the doctor's last name

email.description: This is the doctor's email address

password.description: This is the doctor's passkey that would be used during authentication process

phoneNumber.description: This is the doctor's phone number

address.description: This is the doctor's residential address

licenseNumber.description: This is the doctor's medical license number

specialization.description: This is the doctor's medical specilization field

id.description: This is an auto-generated doctor's identification number

firstName.description: This is the patient's first name

lastName.description: This is the patient's last name

email.description: This is the patient's email address

password.description: This is the patient's passkey that would be used during authentication process

phoneNumber.description: This is the patient's phone number

address.description: This is the patient's residential address

dateOfBirth.description: This is the patient's date of birth

healthCondtion.description: This is the patient's health condition

insuranceMembershipNumber.description: This is the patient's insurance membership number

notes.example: An appointment set between doctor and patient

status.description: This is the status of the appointment whether it was served or not. True for served. False for pending or not served. Default is false.

diagnosisType.description: This is the type of diagnosis performed

result.description: This is the result of diagnosis

glucoseLevel.description: This is the patient's glucose level in mg/dL

healthCondition.description: This is the Patient's underlying medical condtions

bloodPressure.description: This is the patient's blood pressure in mm Hg diastolic

bloodCount.description: This is the Patient's blood count per liter of blood in trillions

urineAnalysis.description: This is the Patient's urine analysis
urineAnalysis.example: Color  Yellow (light/pale to dark/deep amber) Clarity/turbidity  Clear or cloudy. pH  4.5-8.

bloodGroup.description: This is the Patient's blood group

amount.description: This is the amount to of the payment

status.description: This is the status of the payment whether it was paid or not. True for paid. False for pending or not paid. Default is false.

amount.description: This is the amount to of the payment

name.description: This is the name of the medication

price.description: This is the price to of the medication

prescription.description: This is the prescription of the medication
